Full reports from my microbiome tests.


Reports I received from common microbiome providers. Study these if you're curious what results will look like, or if you'd like to compare yours to mine.

## Tiny Health
Tiny Health focuses on the infant microbiome, but the same WGS technology will work in adults too, of course. Here's the result of a sample I took on 
[Tiny Health 2022-11-21](https://richardsprague.com/docs/microbiome/tinyhealth/sprague-2022-11-21.pdf)
